description.message: Set a new wallpaper from 500px website as background of your New Tab page.

welmessage.message:
Welcome !
Thanks for having install this addon.

welreq.message: Due to a technical compatibility, this addon require to have Firefox version 60 at least installed.

weldon.message: If you wish to make a donation to the devlopper, please click on the link below. It will reward the work and time spent in development.

welmore.message: You wish to report a bug, submit a request, participate in the translation? Click on the link below to access the repository page.

settings-intro.message: The addon can proceed to the downloading of three wallpapers from 500px website, or you can or you can load your own wallpapers yourself. Both solutions will apply the first wallpaper downloaded in the background on the Firefox New Tab page.You can add as many wallpapers as you want, they will be saved permanently.

option_selection.message: Please choosing one of theses way purposed below:

auto_option_desc.message: The automatic option trigger the automatique download of three first wallpapers  from 500px site.

period_option_select.message: Please now choosing the time laps to wait before that the addon download tree new wallpapers:

period_option_selection.message: Please now select the time between the downloads of the three wallpapers, the type of duration is expressed either in hours, days or once a week (from Monday)

no_period_validation.message: You must choose a time laps.

no_local_file.message: You must choose select one wallpaper at least.

newtab_perm_needed_desc.message: Required permission from you is required for the extension to have read and write access to the Firefox settings, this permission can be revoked at any time. To revoke it, navigate in the 'Home' tab of Firefox, the extension will be indicated after the 'New windows and new tabs' heading.

newtab_revoker_action.message: Deny the special access to the addon.

newtab_revoker.message: The button below is used to remove the special access to the addon.

newtab_revoked.message: The special access is refused to the addon!

local_file_saving.message: Save the wallpaper in the addon and apply it

local_file_desc.message: Please click on the 'Browse' button to select the wallpaper that you want
